Line 39: Line 39:
==Reception==
==Reception==
â
''Wing Commander'' was panned by critics: its 9% 'fresh' rating on [[Rotten Tomatoes]] is amongst the lowest ever recorded on that site.<ref name="rottent">{{cite web|url=http://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/wing_commander/|title=Wing Commander (1999) on Rotten Tomatoes | accessdate=2008-12-23}}</ref> It is also considered a major box office flop: the total domestic gross of Wing Commander's theatrical run is estimated at $11,578,059, not nearly enough to recoup its $30 million budget.<ref name="boxoff">{{cite web|url=http://www.boxofficemojo.com/movies/?id=wingcommander.htm |title=Wing Commander (1999) on Box Office Mojo | accessdate=2008-12-23}}</ref> Chris Roberts never directed another motion picture. He did, however, serve as a producer on ''[[The Punisher (2004 film)|The Punisher]]'', ''[[The Jacket]]'' and ''[[Lord of War]]''. A considerable amount of the gross could be attributed to the fact that a new theatrical trailer for ''[[Star Wars Episode I: The Phantom Menace]]'' premiered before this film in theaters, which would be released two months later.
+
''Wing Commander'' was panned by critics: its 9% 'fresh' rating on [[Rotten Tomatoes]] is amongst the lowest ever recorded on that site.<ref name="rottent">{{cite web|url=http://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/wing_commander/|title=Wing Commander (1999) on Rotten Tomatoes | accessdate=2008-12-23}}</ref> It is also considered a major box office flop: the total domestic gross of Wing Commander's theatrical run is estimated at $11,578,059, not nearly enough to recoup its $30 million budget.<ref name="boxoff">{{cite web|url=http://www.boxofficemojo.com/movies/?id=wingcommander.htm |title=Wing Commander (1999) on Box Office Mojo | accessdate=2008-12-23}}</ref> Chris Roberts never directed another motion picture. He did, however, serve as a producer on ''[[The Punisher (2004 film)|The Punisher]]'', ''[[The Jacket]]'' and ''[[Lord of War]]''. A considerable amount of the gross could be attributed to the fact that a new theatrical trailer for ''[[Star Wars Episode I: The Phantom Menace]]'' premiered before this film in theaters, which would be released two months later.{{fact}}
